name: The Pumpkin Plague
description:
31.10.1922

Sealed away in your lab, you have been searching for a cure to the Pumpkin Plague. Now, you must venture into the infected archives to find the last clues to complete your research. Beware, finding a cure may require... unconventional methods.

Symptoms:
  • Paranoia
  • Hallucinations
  • Shortness of breath
  • Orange-tinted skin
  • Painful death
Controls KeyFunctionWASDWalkShiftRunLeft Click / Right ClickPick Up / Dismiss Note
E (Hold)Take a Deep Breath... The Team

  • Benji Savage: Level Design, 3D Art
  • Janrinke Bruinsma: Composer, Sound Designer
  • Igor Kovacevic: Programming, VFX
Extra Assets
  • Textures from AmbientCG
  • Book and Note PNGs from PngWing
  • AI paintings from OpenAI DALL-E 2.
  • Character Controller Super
Made in 2 days for Lame Jam 22. Happy Halloween!
